hints.content:
$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{6} \text{ Linda's pieces}\\
+&  \underline{\blue5 \text{ Ava's pieces}}\\
=&\pink{11} \text{ pieces of popcorn all together}\end{align}$

Linda and 
Ava took $\pink{11}$ pieces of popcorn.

question.content:
Linda and Ava shared some popcorn for a snack. Linda took $6$ pieces of popcorn and Ava took $5$ pieces. 

**How many pieces of popcorn did they take in all? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] pieces of popcorn
